Colors

Color are calculated and normalized in sass with functions :

  • ultraligh($color)
  • light($color)
  • hard($color) (more saturate)
  • grey($color)
  • dark($color)

Cartouche

Core

EMF

  <span class="cartouche">
    John Doe
  </span>

Result

John Doe

Color

Color sample, just add colorName to CSS attribute like this class="cartouche prim"

Icons

Based on fontello

Usage

Code sample

<div class="icon-link-outline">
  Some content here
</div>

<!-- or -->

<p>
  Use icon
  <i class="icon-link-outline"></i>
  anywhere.
</p>

Result

Some content here

Use icon anywhere.

Code sample

<div class="icon-pin-outline inverse">
  Some content here
</div>

Result

Some content here

Color

Code sample

<div class="icon-tag inverse green">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse orange">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse blue">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse purple">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse red">Icon</div>

Result

XS Card

.card-footer example

Openable

Le module Openable permet avec des classes CSS des zones cachées/affichées.

Openable API provide show/hide behavior with CSS :

  • .openable : Element with begavior.
  • .handler : Handler to open/close content.
  • .openable-content : Content show/hide.

By default, .openable-content is hide.

exemple with Card: 

<article class="card openable" style="margin-bottom: 1em">
  <header class="card-title">
    <i class="icon-openable handler"></i>
    example
  </header>
  <div class="card-content openable-content">
    <p>
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
      adipisicing elit. Iure eveniet, nam quam
      sit recusandae.
    </p>
  </div>
  <footer class="card-footer">.card-footer example</footer>
</article>
example

Close by default.

.card-footer example

open/close

Card with .openable class are close (.openable-content is hide).

example

Close by default.

.card-footer example
example

Add .open CSS class to card.

.card-footer example
Header as handler

Add .open CSS class to card.

.card-footer example

exemple : 

<article class="card openable" style="margin-bottom: 1em">
  <header class="card-title">
    <i class="icon-openable handler"></i>
    example
  </header>
  <div class="card-content openable-content">
    <p>
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
      adipisicing elit. Iure eveniet, nam quam
      sit recusandae.
    </p>
  </div>
  <footer class="card-footer">.card-footer example</footer>
</article>

Hello, world!

This is a template for a simple marketing or informational website. It includes a large callout called a jumbotron and three supporting pieces of content. Use it as a starting point to create something more unique.
